code: import React from'react';import'./QuestionCard.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuestionCard=_ref=>{let{questionNumber,totalQuestions,question,answers,onAnswerClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"question-number",children:["Domanda ",questionNumber," di ",totalQuestions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"question",children:question}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"answers",children:answers.map((answer,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-answer",onClick:()=>onAnswerClick(index),children:answer})},index))})]});};export default QuestionCard;
